headline: Jack Ma Was Rejected By KFC, Police, And Harvard — Now His Alibaba Fortune Surpasses The Entire Value Of The Fried Chicken Giant
summary: Once rejected by Kentucky Fried Chicken and dozens of other employers, Alibaba Group (NYSE:BABA) founder Jack Ma has risen to become wealthier than the fast-food giant's parent company, Yum! Brands (NYSE:YUM). Early Failures That Shaped a Billionaire Ma, born in 1964 in Hangzhou, China, faced repeated rejection early in life. After college, he applied to roughly 30 jobs in his hometown—and was turned down for every single one. During a 2017 speech at the University of Nairobi, Ma recalled that a
